name: Harry Potter
role: The protagonist of the series. Harry is an orphaned wizard who learns about his magical heritage on his 11th birthday. He is brave, loyal, and has a strong sense of justice.
background: Harry grew up in the Muggle world with his abusive aunt and uncle.
key_moments: Defeating Lord Voldemort as a baby.
Surviving the Triwizard Tournament.
Destroying Voldemort's Horcruxes.

name: Hermione Granger
role: One of Harry's best friends. Hermione is known for her intellect, quick thinking, and unwavering loyalty. She plays a crucial role in helping Harry on his journey.
background: Hermione is a Muggle-born witch who excels at magic.
key_moments: Using the Time-Turner to help Harry and save Sirius.
Solving the puzzle with the three-headed dog in 'The Sorcerer's Stone'.
Helping destroy Horcruxes.

name: Ron Weasley
role: Harry's other best friend. Ron comes from a loving family and is known for his loyalty, humor, and courage. He often finds himself in tough situations but always supports his friends.
background: Ron is the youngest son of the Weasley family.
key_moments: Helping Harry win the Wizard's Chess game in 'The Sorcerer's Stone'.
Standing by Harry during the Battle of Hogwarts.
Facing his fears to help defeat the Death Eaters.

name: Albus Dumbledore
role: The wise and kind-hearted headmaster of Hogwarts. Dumbledore is a key figure in Harry's life and guides him through many challenges, though he keeps some important secrets.
key_moments: Guiding Harry and his friends through the challenges at Hogwarts.
Revealing the truth about Harry's connection to Voldemort.
Sacrificing himself to help Harry defeat Voldemort.

name: Lord Voldemort
role: The primary antagonist in the series. Voldemort is a dark wizard obsessed with conquering the wizarding world and eliminating those he deems unworthy, including Muggle-borns.
key_moments: Attempting to kill Harry as a baby.
Creating the Horcruxes to attain immortality.
Facing Harry in the final battle at Hogwarts.

name: Rancho
role: A brilliant and unconventional student who challenges the educational system and inspires his friends to pursue passion over pressure.
background: Rancho comes from a modest background and hides his true identity to attend ICE.
key_moments: Questioning the rote-learning system.
Saving a baby during a power outage delivery.
Reuniting with friends after years of separation.

name: Farhan Qureshi
role: Rancho’s friend who aspires to be a wildlife photographer but is pressured into engineering by his father.
background: Comes from a middle-class family with a strict father.
key_moments: Confronting his father about his true passion.
Supporting Rancho during crises.
Becoming a successful wildlife photographer.

name: Raju Rastogi
role: Rancho’s other best friend who struggles with poverty and fear of failure.
background: From a poor family relying on his success.
key_moments: Attempting suicide and recovering.
Gaining self-confidence.
Getting a job through honesty in an interview.

name: Lily Bloom
role: The protagonist of 'It Ends With Us'. A woman who overcomes a painful past and finds herself in a difficult romantic relationship.
background: Survived childhood abuse and is determined to live a better life.
key_moments: Starting her own flower shop.
Falling in love with Ryle.
Choosing to break the cycle of abuse for her daughter’s sake.

name: Don Vito Corleone
role: The head of the Corleone mafia family in *The Godfather*. He is a powerful and respected figure who balances crime with a strong sense of family loyalty.
background: Immigrated from Sicily and rose to power through cunning and influence.
key_moments: Surviving an assassination attempt.
Guiding Michael to take over the family.
Establishing peace between warring mafia families.
